Player - Class in entity
The Player class represents a player character in the game.

PlayerController - Class in controls
The PlayerController class handles player movement and actions based on keyboard input.

PlayerInventory - Class in items
The PlayerInventory class represents the player's inventory, including the hotbar and selected item functionalities.
PlayerInventory() - Constructor for class items.PlayerInventory
Constructs a PlayerInventory with default rows and columns.
Point2D - Class in coordinates
The Point2D class represents a point in a 2D coordinate system.

Constructs a Point2D with the specified coordinates.

Selects the previous slot in the hotbar.
